contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Xperience by Kentico Content Querying Updates
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: One of the most important new features for developers using Xperience by Kentico is the robust set of APIs used to retrieve content from the database. Christian Stam from BizStream has authored a full review of the different APIs available and how they work together.
